Package cinemapackage

Class PlatinumMovieSuit

java.lang.Object
cinemapackage.Cinema
cinemapackage.PlatinumMovieSuit
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICinemaBooking, Serializable
public class PlatinumMovieSuit extends Cinema
Subclass of Cinema object. Specialises in printing layout of cinema and get multiplier mechanism
Since:
06-11-2022
